## assistive-playwright-test package

This package contains Playwright Test fixtures allowing to easily use Playwright Test to test a web application with a screen reader.

## Interfaces

|  Interface | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [TestFixtures](./assistive-playwright-test.testfixtures.md) | Set of [fixtures](https://playwright.dev/docs/test-fixtures) provided by assistive-playwright-test at the test level. |
|  [TestOptions](./assistive-playwright-test.testoptions.md) | Set of options provided by assistive-playwright-test at the test level which can be specified in the Playwright configuration file. |
|  [WorkerFixtures](./assistive-playwright-test.workerfixtures.md) | Set of [fixtures](https://playwright.dev/docs/test-fixtures) provided by assistive-playwright-test at the worker level. |
|  [WorkerOptions](./assistive-playwright-test.workeroptions.md) | Set of options provided by assistive-playwright-test at the worker level which can be specified in the Playwright configuration file. |

## Variables

|  Variable | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [test](./assistive-playwright-test.test.md) | Test object that extends the base [Playwright Test](https://playwright.dev/docs/api/class-test) object to provide extra [worker fixtures](./assistive-playwright-test.workerfixtures.md) and [test fixtures](./assistive-playwright-test.testfixtures.md)<!-- -->. |

## Type Aliases

|  Type Alias | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [AssistivePlaywrightTestConfig](./assistive-playwright-test.assistiveplaywrighttestconfig.md) | Describes the type of the default export of a Playwright Test configuration file that uses assistive-playwright-test. |
